lines.text: Look, whatever happened last night, I faked every bit of it.
[Jane starts to walk off]
Jane!
[She stops and looks back]
That's why it was so good.

[stoned and dreaming]
Mr. Einstein! I'm feeling strange. Someone's putting some shit on my mind.
Sounds like too many chili dogs, Dex. Have to learn to relax!
But there was marijuana there! I saw it!
I think you smoked it, Miss Bernhardt.
You talkin' to me?
Yeah pal, he's talkin' to you.
Are you talkin' to me?
He already said he was, Barney.
Well, you must be talkin' to me. I'm the only one here.
Where am I, Barn?
Dexter, keep this to yourself, okay?
Always do! I got a file in my head two feet thick 'bout a WHOLE lotta things you do that I keep to myself.
Barney bonehead.
Up yours.
Ready buddy?
Ready Freddie!
Don't you ever call me that. Call me that again, and I'll kill you!
Well, well, you two like some refreshments? Plenty of punch left in those watermelons over there.
Looks like you had your share.
Oh, I had a little. Sure love some more.
I've had just about enough of you, buddy.
So how does the world look through cracked glasses?
Cracked.
Who are you going to the prom with, Barney? Why don't you go with one of your mice friends?
Alan, take your finger outta your nose. What'd I tell you about that shit? Now suck it!
Dexter, do you have your pass key on you?
Sure do, Mr. C. What do you need?
My key doesn't seem to work in this lock.
We all seem to have that same problem sometimes, now don't we?
Barn, sometimes life is like an onion. When you peel it, it makes you cry.
